title: Picture Framing for Beginners
brief_description: A comprehensive guide to picture framing and mounting showing every step for successful framing. Using inexpensive equipment, the hobby can also become a profitable sideline. There are sections on the tools required, measuring (in inches) framing dimensions, cutting and joining mitres, selecting the mount material, cutting the mount and the glass, selecting the frame material, framing and securing the picture, and positioning the hooks.
